title: Fee
content: I took admission through PESSAT in cse and during admission I submitted DD worth 5 lakhs and now for hostel I have to make a DD of 1.5 lakh, I just wanted to know is this specifically for the time of admission or id have to pay 7 lakhs each year? Like online I see fees is 3.9 lakhs and id paid 5 for admission and 1.5 for hostel. What exactly is fee for Pes through PESSAT including hostel.

comments.body:
College fee is exactly what you paid. Minus the ~10k counseling fee.

Hostel fee is exactly what you paid, minus the 30k caution deposit which will be returned whenever you leave the hostel. I think they also keep like 3k per year from that as well
And this yearly right? Both hostel and college fees
When is the hostel booking starting ?
Bruh wth I didn't got any mail or something
Can you brief me about hostel booking?
how did you get to know?
It started the day of councelling only
Till when is it open for booking?
Bro contact the warden heâ€™ll send you every detail about what you need
Can you share the phone number?
